description: This file defines SQLAlchemy ORM models for a recipe application, including User, Recipe, and RecipeRating classes, with database schema details and relationships.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Represents user accounts with authentication details and relationships to recipes and ratings.

classes.name: Recipe
classes.description: Represents recipes created by users, including ingredients, steps, metadata, and ratings.

classes.name: RecipeRating
classes.description: Represents user ratings and comments for recipes, with constraints to prevent duplicate ratings.

methods.name: _is_sqlite
methods.description: Determines whether the current database engine is SQLite.

methods.name: ArrayOfString
methods.description: Returns the appropriate column type for storing list of strings, depending on the database backend.
